item.title: By: Jessica @ Sweet Menu
item.dc:creator: Jessica @ Sweet Menu
item.description: How amazing are these? I can't believe you can make your own ice cream cones! They are gorgeous and a zillion times better than homemade!
item.content:encoded: How amazing are these? I can’t believe you can make your own ice cream cones! They are gorgeous and a zillion times better than homemade!

item.title: By: Rowena
item.dc:creator: Rowena
item.description: Hi Anita, just wanted to say how much I appreciate all of the effort you put into replicating these Masterchef desserts. I watched the last episodes of MC Australia's season 4 (finally, on a regular non-premium station here in Italy!), and enjoyed the finale. Long story short, while I was searching the recipes, I came across the V8 cake (of which I've never seen the episode) and ended up at your blog since I was looking for HELP! Needless to say, I want to give it a go as soon as I'm able to source the ingredients. Keep up the great work!
item.content:encoded: Hi Anita, just wanted to say how much I appreciate all of the effort you put into replicating these Masterchef desserts. I watched the last episodes of MC Australia’s season 4 (finally, on a regular non-premium station here in Italy!), and enjoyed the finale. Long story short, while I was searching the recipes, I came across the V8 cake (of which I’ve never seen the episode) and ended up at your blog since I was looking for HELP! Needless to say, I want to give it a go as soon as I’m able to source the ingredients. Keep up the great work!
